title: Software Engineer
description:
About Codesmith

Codesmith is a leading enterprise software company focused on building scalable, secure applications that power Fortune 500 businesses worldwide. Our team of passionate engineers works on cutting-edge technologies to solve complex problems.

About The Role

We're seeking a talented Software Engineer to join our Core Platform team in Austin, TX. You'll design, develop, and maintain high-quality software solutions that form the backbone of our product ecosystem. This is a hybrid role with 3 days in office.

$130,000 - $180,000 USD

Responsibilities:
• Build and maintain scalable backend services using Java and Golang
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement new features and improve existing ones
• Participate in code reviews to ensure quality and share knowledge
• Write automated tests and documentation for all code
• Troubleshoot production issues and implement fixes

Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
• 3+ years of professional software development experience
• Strong knowledge of at least one programming language (Java, Python, or Golang)
• Experience with distributed systems and microservices architecture
• Familiarity with AWS or other cloud platforms

Benefits include competitive health insurance, 401(k) matching, unlimited PTO, and continuous learning opportunities.
